text: Arrā no o yorokobi o motome, mata jibun no tamashī o tsuyomeru tame ni, sono shoyū suru mono o hodokosu-sha-tachi o tatoete miyou. Kare-ra wa oka no ue ni aru kaju-en no yō ni, ōame ga sosogeba sono shūkaku wa baika shi, mata ōame ga nakute mo, sukoshi no shimeri (de tariru). Arrā wa anata gata no okonau koto o gozonji de ara reru
